ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah lol it makes much more sense now.  It explains why the gnome is in the slaver pit and why the oracle got his hands on Tergon s book.  (btw, that s
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Michael Ott <mott@...>
> WOW thats a far cry from what the quest used to be.
> it used to be just get the book from the oracle and give it to tergon and
> you get xp cash and a spell.

Yeah lol it makes much more sense now. It explains why the gnome is in the
slaver pit and why the oracle got his hands on Tergon's book. (btw, that's
Bugglepup the troll, not the gnome, oops)
